Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Inequalities and Differences in Education SoSe24 (Lektürekurs BA-KulT-Biwi-3)

Discussions.Discussion_Name: tomorrow's session will take place in room FH 502

Messages.Author: Xenia Krutsch
Messages.Content: Dear students, please note that tomorrow's session will take place in room FH 502. best regards xenia

Messages.Author: Xenia Krutsch
Messages.Content: Dear All,  Sinah and I have decided to bring forward the last content session (TED Talk) and make it asynchronous this Wednesday, June 19. We have prepared the TED Talk for you: https://www.ted.com/talks/ibram_x_kendi_the_difference_between_being_not_racist_and_antiracist?subtitle=en and discussion questions to deepen your understanding. Please watch the TED Talk individually and answer the questions.   We will briefly refer to it again in the last session (July 17).  Accordingly, we will discuss the text "The Trilemma of Anti-Rasicm" on July 3 and listen to the presentation of the last group.  Kind regards Sinah and Xenia
